CompanyName.label: Company Name
CompanyName.value: Natural Grocers by Vitamin Cottage, Inc.

Address.label: Address
Address.value: 12612 WEST ALAMEDA PARKWAY, LAKEWOOD, Colorado, 80228, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Natural Grocers by Vitamin Cottage Inc operates natural and organic grocery and dietary supplement stores. It offers the following product categories, natural and organic food, dietary supplements, natural body care, household, and pet care products. The company generates the majority of its revenue from grocery products and dietary supplements, with the rest from body-care and pet-care products and others.
